channel.title: International Boundary on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in International Boundary on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: MX-15 North Approaching US Border
item.description: MX-15 North approaching US Border in Heroica Nogales. Merge left for (Nogales) Centro. Continue straight for the international border.

item.title: MT-17 South - Welcome To The United States
item.description: MT-17 South - Welcome To The United States of America. Chief Mountain Montana Land Port of Entry.

item.title: AB-6 South - Border Crossing Information
item.description: AB-6 South hours for the border crossing into the United States. U.S.A. Port of Entry - Chief Mountain open 7AM to 10PM.

item.title: BC-95 North - Port of Kingsgate
item.description: Canada Border Services Agency Port of Kingsgate office on BC-95 north.

item.title: BC-95 North - Welcome To Canada
item.description: Welcome To Canada on BC-95 north. Approaching border inspection at Port of Kingsgate.

item.title: US-95 North Approaching US-Canada Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada Border. For Reentry Information Requests turn left to access US Customs. Continue straight ahead for Canada Customs.

item.title: US-95 North - Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs
item.description: US-95 North - All Commercial Vehicles Stop At Customs approaching US-Canada boundary at Eastport.

item.title: US-95 North - Approaching US-Canada International Border
item.description: US-95 north approaching US-Canada International Border in Boundary County.

item.title: WA-25 South - Welcome to Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-25 south. Taken just south of the Port of Frontier border inspection facility.

item.title: WA-25 South - Welcome To The United States
item.description: Welcome To The United States on WA-25 South. Port of Entry at Frontier Washington. Open 24 hours a day. The border facility is in the background.

item.title: BC-22 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on BC-22 South. Distance to USA Border - 1 km. Border crossing at Port of Frontier is open 24 hours.

item.title: ID-1 North - Proceed To Canada Customs
item.description: ID-1 North - Northbound traffic proceed to Canada Customs.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Idaho Port of Entry
item.description: ID-1 North at Porthill Idaho Port of Entry. Merge right to continue into Canada.

item.title: ID-1 North - Border Crossing
item.description: ID-1 north approaching US Customs and Canada Customs. Turn right for the Porthill Post Office.

item.title: ID-1 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on ID-1 north at Porthill. Distance to US Customs and Canada Customs.

item.title: ID-1 North - US-Canada International Boundary
item.description: ID-1 North approaching US-Canada International Boundary at Porthill.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Port of Entry Hours
item.description: Porthill Port of Entry Hours on ID-1 North. Porthill is not a 24 hour port of entry.

item.title: US-95 North - Idaho Ports Of Entry Hours
item.description: Customs hours approaching on US-95 north approaching ID-1 junction. Porthill Port of Entry (via ID-1) open from 7 AM - 11 PM. Eastport Port of Entry (via US-95) open 24 hours.

item.title: US-97 South - Exiting US Customs
item.description: Turn right for US-97 South - Exiting US Customs Port of Oroville facility.

item.title: Begin US-97 South - US Customs
item.description: Welcome to the United States of America - Oroville, Washington Land Port of Entry at the beginning of US-97 south. Taken at the Canadian-USA boundary.

item.title: BC-97 South Approaching Customs - Port of Oroville
item.description: BC-97 South approaching Customs - Port of Oroville. All traffic beyond this sign must report to US Customs.

item.title: BC-97 South Approaching Customs
item.description: Customs / Douanes in 300 meters stop ahead. Approaching the US-Canada border at Port of Oroville.

item.title: BC-99 South - Border Crossing Times
item.description: Vancouver area border crossing times into the USA on BC-99 south. Border crossing times via Peace Arch (BC-99), Pacific X-ING (BC-15), Aldergrove (BC-13), and Sumas (BC-11).

item.title: BC-99 North - Welcome to British Columbia
item.description: Welcome to British Columbia on BC-99 north. Taken just north of Canada Customs.

item.title: I-5 North - Customs and Immigration
item.description: I-5 north - Customs and Immigration 1/2 mile. Use right lanes for Nexus.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 276 Services
item.description: Services located at I-5 Exit 276. This is the last exit before the Canadian border.

item.title: I-5 North - Customs and Immigrations 1 Mile
item.description: I-5 north - Customs and Immigrations 1 Mile.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 275 - WA-543 North/Border Crossing. WA-543 crosses the Canadian border at the Pacific Highway border crossing, which is the border crossing for commercial vehicles. Non-commercial vehicles may cross at Pacific Highway as well.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Map
item.description: Border Crossing map on I-5 north approaching WA-543.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Crossing Hours
item.description: I-5/WA-543 Border Crossing Hours on I-5 north. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossings are open 24 Hours.

item.title: I-5 North - Exit 275
item.description: I-5 north approaching Exit 275 - WA-543 North/Border Crossing. Use WA-543 for the Pacific Highway border crossing into Canada.

item.title: I-5 North - Border Wait Times
item.description: Border Wait Times on I-5 North. Both I-5 (Peace Arch) and WA-543 (Pacific Highway) crossing are less than 5 minutes in this photo. This was taken at 7 AM on a Saturday. As it happened there was only one car in front of me at Canada Customs.

item.title: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America
item.description: I-5 South - Welcome To The United States of America at the US-Canada international boundary. Sign is before the Peace Arch Customs station.

item.title: US-95 - U.S. Border Station, Eastport, Idaho
item.description: US-95 north at the US Border Station - Eastport, Idaho.

item.title: CA-186 North - Welcome To California
item.description: Welcome to California on CA-186 north, just north of US Customs.

item.title: CA-186 South - International Boundary
item.description: International boundary 500 Feet, Last U Turn in USA on CA-186 south approaching Mexico customs.

item.title: End CA-186 South - Mexico Customs
item.description: End CA-186 south at Mexico customs.

item.title: ID-1 South - USA-Canada Border
item.description: Welcome To The United States/US Customs, ID-1 South. This is taken right at the border gate. The post on the right side of the picture is what the border gate is attached to.

item.title: ID-1 South - Welcome To USA and Idaho
item.description: Welcome To the United States of America and Welcome TO Idaho on ID-1 South

item.title: Kingsport, BC Customs Station
item.description: Customs Canada at End of US-95 North

item.title: US-Canada Border - Eastport, ID/Kingsgate, BC
item.description: The international bounday between United States and Canada at the Easport,ID/Kingsgate, BC border crossing. The picture is taken right on the international boundary. You can see a swath of trees cut down at the border itself, and you can see that same swath as a notch at the top of the ridge in the background. United States is to the left - Canada to the right.
